mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventory(supermarket_id, product_id, number) VALUES (#{supermarketId},#{productId},#{number});
mapper.update: UPDATE inventory SET supermarket_id=#{supermarketId}, product_id=#{productId}, number=#{number} WHERE inventory_id=#{inventoryId}
mapper.sql: SELECT A.inventory_id as inventoryId, A.supermarket_id as supermarketId, A.product_id as productId, A.number, B.product_name as productName, B.price, B.sales_price as salesPrice from inventory A, product B WHERE A.product_id=B.product_id
